Posts.Title: have to make desicion had dbm should have my ovaries removed beija beija

Posts.Content: beija wrote: i am now 33 yrs i was diagnost with invacive ductal breast cancer in november 5 2009.  i went through chemo, lumpectomy.  had the brac1/2 done came out positive.  had dmx on sept. last year and my last reconstructive surgery don on december 15.  my dr told me i should get my ovaries removed to lower my risk of cancer.  my granda past away this january she died of ovarian cancer.  i finally found a gynecologist dr that could operate me (mine doesnt) and he sugested me to get eveything removed an hysterectomy, he told me its the best choice.  he is not the only one who said it and he even told me to get a second opinion.   the thing is that he told me to go online and search and now i dont even want to get my ovaries removed when i read of all the symptoms like premenopause, less sex drive and vaginal dryness.  i was sure of the ovaries but now  i am just scared plus i dont want to get an hysterectomy just because i had my breast removed im going to have to get my thyroyd removed because of the chemo.  im just a mess right now. i cant sleep. Guetzaida. Diagnosis 11/04/09 IDC ER+ PR+ HER2- Grade II of III 2cm Dx 11/5/2009, DCIS, 3cm, Stage II, Grade 2, 1/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: have to make desicion had dbm should have my ovaries removed beija beija

Posts.Content: May 30, 2011 12:50AM beija wrote: Hi Just to let you know Ill have everything removed on June 7.  thank you all for your words
Posts.Title: have to make desicion had dbm should have my ovaries removed beija beija

Posts.Content: Jun 10, 2011 11:11AM beija wrote: hi everyone.  did the hysterectomy on tuesday and yesterday i came back home and im taking pain killers and some other meds.  so far so good.  when the effect of the pain killers go away then it gets hard.
Posts.Title: have to make desicion had dbm should have my ovaries removed beija beija

Posts.Content: May 20, 2011 02:34PM beija wrote: thanks omaz, britchick and faithfulheaart for your support.  since i am ERpos my dr told me they could not give me anything with estrogen but that they are other meds to help with the effects of the ovaries.  by the way i am defenetly not going to read more of it on the internet beacause i had no problem removing my ovaries just with the uterus but when i started to look for information i got scared to do the ovaries.  my problem is with the uterus that all my dr tell me the best choice is to remove it  but i guess itss just that it will take longer to heal and i am just tiered of going through the same crap everytime i have to go to surgery with the papers the hospital the medical insurance and then to heal.  i think ive always kept such good humor and i did pretty good but sometimes you just get palin tierd.  it was difficult to have my grandma die of ovarian cancer in christmas while i was healing from my last reconstructive surgery and thats why i know i have to get my ovaries removed.  i dont know why i cant just say ok take my uterus too  less risk netter.  its like why do i have to keep getting parts of my removed.  the thing is that i am not taking the 5 year pill because i have to get the ovaries removed first. im stressed out.  my boyfriend told me to do it because the lower the risk the better but it just makes me want to cry.  i think this is the first time that i just feel that this is so unfair because of cancer icould fly to say goodbye to my grandma i even felt guilty because my brother and my ulces wanted my mom to be beside my grandma and not me while i was going to get my surgery.  i havent flet good physically for more than a year because of the complication of my thyrod.  im just tiered.  why now i have to have my uterus removed basically because of cancer i dont have my breast wont have ovaries and uterus too oh and my thyroyd.
Posts.Title: have to make desicion had dbm should have my ovaries removed beija beija

Posts.Content: Jun 11, 2011 01:13PM beija wrote: pinksurvivor i can understand i am 33 soon to be 34.i was so frustrated becaus i did the test i was mentally prepared to remove my ovaries but when my drs mentioned hysterectomy i just did want to do it. i knew that withoout the ovaries the rest is just there but i felt like that,  why so i have to keep removing my organs.  i cried i got mad and then i just did it.  i spent 2 hours in the drs office with him and my boyfriend telling me over and over agian the reasons why.  i knew why, i understood why i just didnt felt it was fare to remove everything.  at the end i just prayed and let my anger and frustration go away and put my gloves back on for the next stage of the fight.  right now im inmy home with my meds to take the pain away distracting myself by planing a trip for when i get better.  its not easy and we have to allow ourselves to feel bad everyonce in a while.  but then we just have to get back on track and remember that we have to do what we need to do in order to have a healthy life.  i know ive done everything i can to be cancer free. i lost my grandpamy grandma to cancer.  i couldnt see my grandmother before she died on january 5 of this year because i was recovering from my surgery. i lost my breast ive lost  practically 2 years of iving a normal life but im on my road to be healthy.  i am stronger and look at life in a different way.  right now im eating healthy and planing on going back to the gym as soon as my dr says its okay.  im focusing on the positive things.  we are lucky we can do things to make our lives better my grandparents didnt have a chance when it was discovered there was nothing to do so i feel blessed.  ive had great drs and yes sometimes i feel bad but its part of all of this.  hugs to you
Posts.Title: have to make desicion had dbm should have my ovaries removed beija beija
